players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "I am the Mafioso and I killed Bob last night. Stay cautious, as there might be more Mafiosi among us."

players.name: Charlie
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Diana: "I am the Mafioso and I killed Bob last night. Stay cautious, as there might be more Mafiosi among us."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Alice (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Alice
